explains: n. 航海家；领航员；驾驶员
wordGroup: netscape navigator 网景领航员（浏览器名称）

sentences.en: He became a navigator during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争期间他成了一名领航员。

sentences.en: The reputation of the navigator is under assault from historical revisionists.
sentences.cn: 这位航海家的名誉受到了历史修正主义者的攻击。

sentences.en: He is a real great navigator.
sentences.cn: 他真是个伟大的航海家。
